basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Andrea Riley, a software developer. My professional journey has transitioned from the service industry to the dynamic realm of software engineering. In the service industry, I honed my skills in understanding and fulfilling client needs. The pursuit of a lifestyle change and a desire for versatile skills propelled me into the world of software development. I chose software development for its universal applicability, offering the flexibility to excel in diverse industries. The collaborative tech community aligns seamlessly with my preference for teamwork. At the core of my journey is a belief that learning never ends, serving as a guiding force in my career transition. With experience both as a team member and a leader, I bring the skills to effectively collaborate with diverse teams and drive projects to success. Eager to contribute my blend of customer-centricity, teamwork, and leadership to the world of technology, I am driven by a passion for lifelong learning and a commitment to creating solutions that consistently exceed user expectations.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
